name: Shark Attack and Hungry Evolution SImulator 3D
name_original: Shark Attack and Hungry Evolution SImulator 3D
description:
Shark Attack is an action-packed adventure in which you will control hungry shark in the sea water.
Survive as long as possible by eating everything in beach life! Move as soon as possible in the search of food and scare people. He survived a long time, people will be much faster and really fast food, so you can develop the shark!
What about controlling real shark in the presence of other dolphins in the ocean ... exciting idea? Sure it is.
This is a dangerous time to start shooting sharks and "loaded spear fishing”. Now you can finally play a real fish simulation game! Just relax and swim around people to spread chaos and terror. The only thing you need is to eat everything in its swamp and survive as long as possible.

Features:

Simulate real shark in the swamp
Best quality, 3D graphics
Great quality shark mode with 3d physics
3 stunning environments
10 levels in each stage
Intuitive touch for mobile controls
